Is this with the Java Problem grouping or a different one? I can't replicate this myself with the Java Problem grouping. If it is a different one could you please attach a patch for me to replicate this?

Can you also tell me what the selections you made were that made this happen.
That was with the Java problem grouping, but was also quite a while ago. It's seems to be fixed now.
Thanks Martin - I found this about a week ago and fixed and was worried that I had missed a case.
